history.title: Quick access to Credit Report
history.choose_subscription: For complete data, choose a subscription
history.subtitle: Get your credit history with one click

download.subscription_info: Depending on the subscription you've chosen, you can download 1, 2, or an unlimited number of Credit History Reports per month.

email.want: I want the Report by email

order.question: Do you need the Credit History Report stamped or translated and apostilled?
order.agree_terms: I agree with the terms, personal data processing, and privacy policy
order.confirmation: After placing the request, you will be contacted by a consultant who will coordinate the order details with you and present payment options.

summary.not_have_credit_history: No data found to display...It seems that you do not have a credit history in Infodebit yet
summary.order_the_report: Order the report for more details
summary.no_credit_history: No credit history. How to start?

bottom_modal.noticed_debts_at_incaso: We noticed that you have debts at INCASO, would you like to get a discount and/or smaller installment payments? Enter your phone number and press YES if you want convenient payment solutions.

new.button_negative: Choose a subscription and download the Report

success.title: Congratulations!
success.message: According to Infodebit data, you have a good chance of getting a loan. To find out more details about your credit history, order the Report now
success.data_protection: All transmitted data is securely protected
success.disclaimer: <1>*Infodebit does not offer loans and does not charge a fee for this service.</1> <2>You decide whether to accept offers from partner financial institutions, which operate under the supervision of the National Financial Market Commission.</2>

fail.title: Ohhhh, no!
fail.message: According to Infodebit data, your credit history is negative and you have a low chance of getting a loan. To find out the reason, check your credit history report now

sheets.request_success: Your credit request, with number {{id}}, has been successfully registered! An operator will contact you shortly.
sheets.request_pending: You have recently made a credit request. We apologize if you have waited longer. An operator will contact you shortly.
sheets.request_duplicate: You have recently made a credit request, with number {{id}}. Please come back after {{date}}, and we will be happy to assist you. Thank you!

scoring.grown: Don't be discouraged, any score can be improved!
scoring.medium: No matter how slow you go, don't stop!
scoring.fair: Trust yourself and you'll be unstoppable.
scoring.lucky: You are capable of extraordinary things.
scoring.best: Congratulations, you're an example worth following!

scoring_details_benefits.title: With Mylnfodebit, you can better prepare for future loans
scoring_details_benefits.benefit_1: Regularly checking your credit score can help you discover potential errors
scoring_details_benefits.benefit_2: If you are working on improving your score, you can monitor the progress directly in Mylnfodebit
scoring_details_benefits.benefit_3: Checking your score can help you detect fraudulent activities and act promptly
scoring_details_benefits.benefit_4: Knowing your score keeps everything under control and can reduce stress related to loans and debts
